name: IP_REORDER_RX
description: This table contains reordered meds information.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the inpatient data store record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_ERX
columns.description: The original medication the patient was using.

columns.name: REOR_ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The order ID of the medication being reordered.

columns.name: NEW_ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The new order ID for the medication.

columns.name: REORDRD_MED_PEND_YN
columns.description: This determines if the reordered medication is a pending order.
